unittitle_ssm: Baptist churches of Brooklyn publications and ephemera
abstract_ssm: This collection contains printed ephemera and publications of thirteen Baptist churches based in Brooklyn, New York. Items date from 1840 to 2016 and are housed in one manuscript box. Document types in the collection include church manuals, yearbooks, church histories, newsletters, and church service programs. Church manuals contain a church's articles of faith, covenant, and often a list of members and addresses; member names and addresses can also be found in church yearbooks in the collection.
